link_metadata.description: The FBI is now investigating a potential accomplice in the assassination of Charlie Kirk amid the finding of video footage that appears to show the suspect talking to somebody through a doorbell camera in the neighborhood near the crime scene.  Kirk was murdered in a horrific public assassination at Utah Valley University while hosting an event on his “ask me anything” tour on Wednesday.
link_metadata.title: JUST IN: FBI Investigating Possible Accomplice of Charlie Kirk Shooter Seen in Suspicious Footage Despite Squirrelly Utah Governor's Claim that Gunman Acted Alone | The Gateway Pundit | by Jordan Conradson
